title: 2005 Overbuilt 35' Lowboy Trailer with Spring Ramps
item_description:
2005 Overbuilt 35' Lowboy Trailer with Spring Ramps

Trailer Details

  • Year: 2005
  • Make: Overbuilt
  • Model: Lowboy
  • Vin: 1Z9LC532050058773
  • License: 4FY2838
    • Expiration Date: 6/30/1930

Dimensions

  • Overall Length: 422”
  • Overall Width: 102”
  • Overall Height: 73”
  • Deck Width: 102”
  • Lower deck (flat): 368”
  • Upper deck (flat): 152”
  • Ramps: 66”
  • Height to Top Deck: 66”
  • Height to Bottom Deck: 34”

Axles, Brakes, and Tires

  • Suspension: Air Ride
  • Number of Axles: 2
  • Number of Wheels: 8
  • Tire Size: 215/75R17.5
  • Electric Plug Type: 7-Way Round
  • Hitch: 5th Wheel

Note: Certificate of Title, and Transfer Form will be mailed once 1-2 weeks after removal. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of registration, transfer, sales tax, and fees due to the DMV.
